title: The Audition
creator_credit: Counterpoint Films and C B Wismar
brief_description: A young man comes into a seemingly empty theatre for an audition. He is not given a script but it is clear to the invisible director that he can portray surprise & anger can he portray love? Understanding? Pity? Concern? An allegorical tale of life, the young man it appears is the director as well.
